job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Cennox wants all employees to feel valued appreciated and free to be who they are at work Our employee lifecycle processes are designed to prevent discrimination against our people regardless of gender identity or expression sexual orientation religion ethnicity age neurodiversity disability status citizenship or any other aspect which makes them unique Therefore everyone is encouraged to apply for employment with CennoxbrbrCennox is currently seeking a strongSoftware Engineerstrong based instrong Missoula Montanastrong to design develop and support software solutions that are the backbone to our companys success This strongfulltime positionstrong offers insurance and 401k benefits and the chance to become part of a rapidly growing companybrbrOur ideal candidate is a creative knowledgehungry software guru who possesses the ability to wear many hats and actively contribute in a team environment Your primary focus will be to design develop and support software solutions that are the backbone of our companys success We seek someone with a passion for technology and the ability to share their passion with both IT and nonIT professionals alike uWe are searching for the candidate who is a great fit for our organization therefore we will consider both new graduates and experienced applicants for this positionbrbruAs a Software Engineer you will work closely with IT professionals in our office along with coworkers in other offices around the world via phone and internet The position will be fastpaced at times challenging but also very rewardingbrbrstrongResponsibilitiesbrstrongulliExecute full lifecycle software developmentliliDevelop welldesigned testable efficient codeliliProvide ongoing maintenance support and enhancements in learning new technologies and apply the best solution to the problemliliExcellent verbal and written communication skillsliliAbility to work in a team environment and take on various rolesliliAbility to think creatively and contribute outofthebox solutionsliliStrong organizational multitasking and time management abilitiesliliSelfmotivated and proactive in the working environmentliliHighly professional and reliablebrbrliulstrongExperience and EducationbrstrongulliBachelor of Science degree in Computer Science Engineering or related field  or equivalent experienceliliExperience with Java preferredliliExperience with AWS or similar cloud environments preferredbrbrliulstrongPhysical RequirementsbrstrongulliAbility to sit and stay focused for long periods of time with finger dexterity
